<?php
 namespace blobfolio\wp\wh\vendor\phone\data; class dataCU extends data { const CODE = 'CU'; const PREFIX = 53; const REGION = 'North America'; const PATTERNS = array( '[27]\d{6,7}|[34]\d{5,7}|(?:5|8\d\d)\d{7}', ); const TYPES = array( '(?:3[23]|48)\d{4,6}|(?:31|4[36]|8(?:0[25]|78)\d)\d{6}|(?:2[1-4]|4[1257]|7\d)\d{5,6}'=>array( 'fixed', ), '5\d{7}'=>array( 'mobile', ), '800\d{7}'=>array( 'toll_free', ), '807\d{7}'=>array( 'shared_cost', ), ); const FORMATS = array( '(\d{2})(\d{4,6})'=>'$1 $2', '(\d)(\d{6,7})'=>'$1 $2', '(\d)(\d{7})'=>'$1 $2', '(\d{3})(\d{7})'=>'$1 $2', ); }
